participant_1.name: Emma Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and nurturing, Emma is passionate about her work and dedicated to her children.
participant_1.background: I didn't have any contact with my parents last year. I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction. I spend most of my days working hard on my farm, but when I get a chance to relax, I love to swim. As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office. I am raising my kids on my own.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Shy yet motivated, Jake is a thoughtful individual who enjoys exploring new ideas and hobbies.
participant_2.background: I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company. i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted. I think my pets are the best things in my life. i do not have a job and sit on the couch all day. I collect fantasy novels to expand my mind and escape from the real world.

content.text: Good! I'm on my way to uc santa cruz, excited to start my new life!
Oh that's awesome! I'm just starting my internship in construction, I'm excited to learn more about it!
That's cool! What made you want to get into construction?
I've always liked working with my hands, and I think it's a really important job. What about you, why are you going to UCSC?
I'm really interested in fantasy novels, and I want to study literature. I also have two pet dogs that I love to death, they're the best things in my life.
That's so cool! I love fantasy novels too, they're a great way to escape from the real world. I also have two kids, I'm raising them on my own.
Oh wow, that must be tough! But I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Well, I'm sure you're going to do great at your internship! And I'm excited to start my new life at UCSC.
Thanks! And good luck with your studies
